name: Deciphering_You
description:
Here's a attempt to a different way to play mazes. In this game, the main character Yu starts a journey to the self-knowledge, at the same time, she can receive messages thought the levels, from a unknow person. At each level, she feels that is getting closer enough to know the misterious author. Where are they journey is going to take her?

#Unzip and have fun! :)

#SGJ20 <3
